FuncDef: The display bgp rpd routing-table statistics command displays the statistics of routes in the BGP RPD address family.
CLIs: display bgp rpd routing-table peer <ipv4-address> { advertised-routes | received-routes } statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about routes of a specified peer.
It is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about the routes advertised to a specified peer.
-

Displays information about the routes received from a specified peer.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the statistics of desired RPD routes, you can specify parameters as required.
